data.name: NumberingLevel
desc: provides access to a numbering level as part of the Numbering Rules.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: Adjust
desc: adjusts the numbering (HoriOrientation_LEFT/RIGHT/CENTER)

properties.name: BulletChar
desc: contains the symbol in the given font.
This is only valid if the numbering type is com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.CHAR_SPECIAL.

properties.name: BulletColor
desc: contains the color for the symbol.
This is only valid if the numbering type is com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.CHAR_SPECIAL.

properties.name: BulletFont
desc: the font used to paint the bullet.

properties.name: BulletFontName
desc: the name of the font for the symbol.
This is only valid if the numbering type is com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.CHAR_SPECIAL.

properties.name: BulletId
desc: the ID of the symbol in the given font.
This is only valid if the numbering type is com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.CHAR_SPECIAL.

properties.name: BulletRelSize
desc: contains the size of the symbol relative to the high of the paragraph.
This is only valid if the numbering type is com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.CHAR_SPECIAL.

properties.name: CharStyleName
desc: Name of the character style that is used for the numbering symbol.

properties.name: FirstLineIndent
desc: additional line indent for the first text line

properties.name: FirstLineOffset
desc: specifies the offset between the beginning of the first line and the beginning of the following lines of the paragraph.

properties.name: GraphicBitmap
desc: the graphic file that is used as the numbering symbol.
This is only valid if the numbering type is com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.BITMAP.

properties.name: GraphicSize
desc: size of the graphic that is used as bullet.

properties.name: GraphicURL
desc: the URL of the graphic file that is used as the numbering symbol.
This is only valid if the numbering type is com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.BITMAP.

Note the new behaviour since it this was deprecated: This property can only be set and only external URLs are supported (no more vnd.sun.star.GraphicObject scheme). When an URL is set, then it will load the bitmap and set the GraphicBitmap property.

properties.name: HeadingStyleName
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that is interpreted as the header of this level.
It is only contained in the levels of chapter numbering rules.

properties.name: IndentAt
desc: indentation of the text lines

properties.name: LabelFollowedBy
desc: character following the list label

properties.name: LeftMargin
desc: specifies the left margin of the numbering

properties.name: ListtabStopPosition
desc: list tab position

properties.name: NumberingType
desc: specifies the type of numbering.

properties.name: ParagraphStyleName
desc: contains the name of the paragraph style that should use this numbering.
This is ignored for chapter numbering rules, use HeadingStyleName.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: ParentNumbering
desc: number of upper levels that are included in the current numbering symbol.

properties.name: PositionAndSpaceMode
desc: position and space mode

properties.name: Prefix
desc: the prefix of the numbering symbol.

properties.name: StartWith
desc: specifies the start value for the numbering.
This property is only valid if the numbering type is not com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.BITMAP or com.sun.star.style.NumberingType.CHAR_SPECIAL.

properties.name: Suffix
desc: the suffix of the numbering symbol.

properties.name: SymbolTextDistance
desc: specifies the distance between the numbering symbol and the text of the paragraph.

properties.name: VertOrient
desc: contains the vertical orientation of a graphic.
It is set using com.sun.star.text.VertOrientation.
